short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate ChatGPT prompts with prompt chains and queues for efficient, time-saving interactions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly save and send multiple messages to ChatGPT in sequence, streamlining your workflow and saving time.

➤ How it works

•Save a sequence of messages you usually use.
•Select your saved sequence, and the extension sends each message one by one automatically.

Compared to the manual labor of repeating the same questions, this extension allows you to save sequences you frequently repeat and reuse them on demand.

➤ Why Choose ChatGPT Prompt Automation Queue?

~ Free
•Unlimited Saved Sequences: Store as many sequences as you need.
•Unlimited Messages per Sequence: No limit on the number of messages in a sequence.
•Cross-Platform Support: Works on all operating systems with Chrome.
•Supports Multiple GPT Versions: Compatible with GPT-4, GPT-4o, GPT-3.5.

➤ Perfect For:

•Bloggers: Automate writing, ranking, and rewriting content by reusing common prompts.
•Researchers: Streamline data cleaning, pattern finding, and extracting insights with repetitive sequences.
•Content Creators: Enhance your content production process by automating common tasks and prompts.
•Developers: Automate coding tasks, debugging steps, and documentation creation.

➤ Key Features

•Save Sequence: Save a chain of multiple prompts for comprehensive responses from ChatGPT.
•Automatic Sending: Select your saved sequence, and the extension sends each message one by one automatically.

➤ Frequently Asked Questions:

•Is ChatGPT Prompt Automation Queue free to use?
Yes, it is completely free.
•What operating systems are supported?
All of them, as long as you use Chrome.
•Do I need to sign in to my ChatGPT/OpenAI account?
The extension operates on your local computer, so you do not need to log in to your ChatGPT account within the extension.
•What is ChatGPT Prompt Automation Queue?
ChatGPT Prompt Automation Queue is a browser extension that saves and sends multiple messages automatically to ChatGPT. It waits for a response from ChatGPT and then sends the next saved message automatically.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Download now and automate your ChatGPT interactions effortlessly!
